elements.text: You have not been sleeping well this week because of a stressful situation at work. After an especially restless night of sleep, you notice your eye is twitching the next day. Instead of thinking it is a symptom of HD, you realize you are just...

elements.name: Eye Twitch_Presymptomatic_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
